data.title: The CAPITAL Hotels, Apartments & Resorts South Africa
data.meta_description: Stay, work, meet & live in the best locations in South Africa. Experience luxury accommodation with The CAPITAL Hotels, Apartments & Resort. Book now!
data.text:
Welcome

You've found the best place to stay

City

Hotel

Check-in & Check-out

Guests

Stay with us in Sandton, Melrose, Rosebank, Menlyn, Umhlanga, Mbombela and Cape Town and experience our cosmopolitan vibe. We are proud to be South Africa’s fastest-growing owner-managed fully serviced apartments and hotel rooms provider.

Read More

Fast Facts:

National operation with multiple properties in key locations

Hybrid hotels with fully serviced luxury apartments (1200+ rooms)

World-class conferencing facilities and adaptable meeting rooms, able to accommodate large scale events

Enjoy an array of complimentary services: uncapped high-speed Wi-Fi, scheduled shuttles, laundry in apartments and secure parking

Bookable online, via our app, and on global distribution systems (GDS)

Corporate rates and special offers available

Best price guarantee for La Famiglia members

Hotels & Apartments

Stay, work, meet and live in the best locations in South Africa

On The Park

Cosmopolitan living at its best, where no detail is left unconsidered, and everything is provided for.

FIND OUT MORE

Empire

Stylish and centrally located, with a view from the top, you couldn’t be anywhere but Empire.

FIND OUT MORE

Seven Villa Hotel & Spa

Set in a lush secret garden, a natural sanctuary tucked away in the centre of lively Sandton.

FIND OUT MORE

Menlyn Maine

Enjoy luxurious hotel rooms and apartments in Pretoria, at a less-than-expected rate.

FIND OUT MORE

Trilogy

A world of entertainment, shopping and business is practically at your doorstep.

FIND OUT MORE

Melrose

Impressive, cool industrial-chic interiors, coupled with all the modern conveniences you’d ever need.

FIND OUT MORE

On Bath

Bringing you closer to all the essential luxuries Rosebank has to offer; whether that’s hotel rooms, apartments or penthouses.

FIND OUT MORE

15 on Orange

A showstopper with distinctive design, set within Cape Town’s richly historical Company’s Garden.

FIND OUT MORE

Mirage

Situated in the uber-trendy De Waterkant area, enjoy the incomparable Cape Town lifestyle.

FIND OUT MORE

Pearls

Contemporary living spaces that strike a balance between the comfort of home and the luxury of resort living.

FIND OUT MORE

Zimbali

A magnet for fun seekers, families, couples, solo explorers and business travellers.

FIND OUT MORE

Mbomela

Sophisticated, the ultimate luxury destination for upscale experiences. A showcase of smart functionality, this hotel features modern and open design.

FIND OUT MORE
